Class Streams

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.softhouse.common.testlib.Streams

public final class Streams
extends Object
    Utility for working with Readable and stream instances.

    • Method Summary

      static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<String> readAsynchronously(InputStream source)
      Reads from source asynchronously.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • readAsynchronously

        public static com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<String> readAsynchronously(InputStream source)
        Reads from source asynchronously. Use Future.get() to get the characters read. Characters will be read using UTF-8. A typical use case is to avoid deadlock pitfalls when launching processes.
